response.overview: William Thatcher, a knight's peasant apprentice, gets a chance at glory when the knight dies suddenly mid-tournament. Posing as a knight himself, William won't stop until he's crowned tournament champion—assuming matters of the heart don't get in the way.
response.title: A Knight's Tale

results.name: "How Can I Prove My Love To You?"
William Charms Jocelyn In front Of Count Adhemar
